segments.text: Could you hold the elevator , please ? Thanks a lot .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm headed to the 18th floor , the top floor .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you work there ? I have an interview today with Dale Mendoza . Do you know her ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , I know her pretty well .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: To tell you the truth , I'm really nervous . I had a dream last night that I was being interviewed by a three-headed monster that kept trying to bite my head off . Oh , wow , my palms are sweaty just thinking about it . I just hope Ms . Mendoza won't be able to hear my teeth chattering . I just hope I get through this in one piece .
segments.speaker: S1
